sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtssyslogsummary ( OCCRRNC_DE , svc_nm , method_nm , creat_co , updt_co , rdcnt , delete_co , outpt_co , error_co ) VALUES ( #occrrncDe# , #svcNm# , #methodNm# , #creatCo# , #updtCo# , #rdcnt# , #deleteCo# , #outptCo# , #errorCo# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtssyslogsummary SET occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# , svc_nm = #svcNm# , method_nm = #methodNm# , creat_co = #creatCo# , updt_co = #updtCo# , rdcnt = #rdcnt# , delete_co = #deleteCo# , outpt_co = #outptCo# , error_co = #errorCo# WHERE occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND svc_nm = #svcNm# AND method_nm = #methodNm#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtssyslogsummary WHERE occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND svc_nm = #svcNm# AND method_nm = #methodNm#
sqlMap.select: SELECT occrrnc_de , svc_nm , method_nm , creat_co , updt_co , rdcnt , delete_co , outpt_co , error_co FROM comtssyslogsummary WHERE occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# AND svc_nm = #svcNm# AND method_nm = #methodNm#

SELECT occrrnc_de , svc_nm , method_nm , creat_co , updt_co , rdcnt , delete_co , outpt_co , error_co FROM comtssyslogsummary WHERE 1=1
occrrnc_de = #searchKeyword#
svc_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY occrrnc_de DESC , svc_nm DESC , method_nm DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtssyslogsummary WHERE 1=1
occrrnc_de = #searchKeyword#
svc_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
